Name: Age of Population
Description: The player with the most Acolytes in play gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Exploration
Description: The player with the most spaces containing their Acolytes (regardless of control) gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Austerity
Description: Any player who does not Harvest any spaces at the end of this Age gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Dominion
Description: The player with the most spaces controlled gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Connection
Description: The player with the most spaces connected to their Colossus via Acolyte roads gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Patience
Description: Any player who has 6 cards in their hand at the end of this Age gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Beasts
Description: If you control all face-up Beast lairs, gain 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Diplomacy
Description: The player with the most Acolytes on spaces that they do not control gains 10 Gold.
